title: The Colours of Boards
body:
I think the colours are a bit bad. The combination and mixture just don't fit and to have too much dark colours is ugly. I'd prefer it brighter and more enlightening, like the old Forums, which was white. The layout is good but the colours just seem crap. Thoughts?

P.S: I'm solely talking about the colours.

replies.body: This color is too dark and hurts my eyes, just like dota and the new map...

> This color is too dark and hurts my eyes, just like dota and the new map...

How can dark colours hurt your eyes?
It hurts my eyes squinting through the colors trying to decipher what is written...

> > This color is too dark and hurts my eyes, just like dota and the new map...
> 
> How can dark colours hurt your eyes?

He's whatever is the opposite of a vampire.
i thought the exact same xD the colours are bad though.
